document_data.name: Dashadjen
document_data.mainbody: '''Dashadjen''' was an ancient city of the [[Calim Empire]], which fell into ruins. The fortified military city was the major garrison for the armies of [[Calim]] before and during the [[First Era of Skyfire]].<ref name=EotSS-p79/>
document_data.Geography: Dashadjen was located in what became the [[Calim Desert]], west of the [[Trade Way]].<ref name=EotSS-map> Because it was located in one of the primary regions where the spirits of Calim and [[Memnon (efreeti)|Memnon]] clashed, the stones of the city were pulverized to sand and tiny fragments.<ref name=EotSS-p79/>
document_data.History: Dashadjen was founded sometime before {{Yearlink|-6500}}. After serving as a fortress city for Calim's armies in the Era of Skyfire, it was seized by the nation of [[Coramshan]].<ref name=LEoF-p117>
document_data.Notable Locations: By [[1374 DR]], only a single structure from Dashadjen remained intact—the [[Altar of the Air]]. This shrine was built during the realm of Coramshan, and some unknown magic protected it over the millennia.<ref name=LEoF-p118>
